Description: You lash out with a quick unarmed strike at a creature in range. As a bonus action, you can immediately move up to 10ft and make a melee attack against a creature in range without taking an attack of opportunity, doing normal damage on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
